price: Mẽne ne ya yi jinsu*, kuma mẽne ne ya yi ganinsu a rãnar da suke zo Mana! Amma azzãlumai sunã a cikin ɓata bayyananna.
arabic: أَسۡمِعۡ بِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصِرۡ يَوۡمَ يَأۡتُونَنَا لَٰكِنِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: * A rãnar Lãhira a lõkacin da ake yi musu hisãbi a gaban Allah ganinsu da jinsu sunã da kyau ƙwarai, amma a nan dũniya sunã a cikin makanta da kurumci sabõda ɓatar da suka yi, suka ƙaryata Ĩsã, aminci ya tabbata a gare shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
